name: Andromeda - 495 Advanced Production
description:
Indiana Jones and Guardians of the Galaxy meets Super Metroid and Mega Man X with a focus on platforming and not combat similar to Super Meat Boy. A 3D Side-scrolling Action Platformer combining fast paced platforming with currency collection and unlockable abilities.

All donations go directly to the Computer Graphics Club at Chico State, less a 10% donation to Itch.IO for hosting services
